title: The Curse of Revenge
description: Uncover the origins of Thruna, the woman from Thrace, who captured the heart of Oceanus and became the Tethys of legend.This novella is part of the series prequel for the Ancient Legends collection, a family saga surrounding the origins of Greek mythology and its true place in history. The series begins with book one, The Curse of Beauty.
author: Lauren Lee Merewether
